name: I Love Soccer Online Trivia | Soccer | 5 Questions

questions.text: How many players from each team can be on the soccer field during a game at the same time?
questions.explanation:
11.

	There are always 11 players on the field at one time, in any country.

questions.text: What don't soccer players have to be wearing to play a game?
questions.explanation:
Sweet Spots.

	Sweet Spots are worn on the shoes to give better aim to your shots and do not have to be worn. However shingaurds, jerseys, and cleats must be worn.

questions.text: What is the name for a kick that the goalie does in the goal box if the ball goes out of bounds off the other team?
questions.explanation:
Goal Kick.

	When the balls goes out of bounds off the offensive team (at the time), the kick is called a goal kick.

questions.text: When a player is tripped or pushed in the penalty box, what is the result?
questions.explanation:
Penalty kick.

	When a player is tripped in the penalty box the result is called a penalty shot or kick.

questions.text: What women's star gave women's soccer a huge boost, along with an Olympic gold medal for the sport and the USA?
questions.correct: Mia Hamm & Hamm & Ham & Mia Ham
questions.explanation:
Mia Hamm & Hamm & Ham & Mia Ham.

	Mia Hamm is the most looked up to player in the world for women's soccer.
